actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: Expressing the sense of Congress that there should be a freeze on new discretionary non-defense, non-homeland security, non-intelligence spending whenever there is a Federal budget deficit.

summary.text: Calls for Congress to freeze new discretionary non-defense, non-homeland security, non-intelligence, and non-veterans spending whenever there is a federal budget deficit, until the budget is in balance.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that there should be a freeze on new discretionary non-defense, non-homeland security, non-intelligence spending whenever there is a Federal budget deficit.
